name: Alert My Star Destroyer! (V)
Lore: 'For important Imperial dignitaries, an individual Star Destroyer is placed at their disposal.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. During your deploy phase, you may reveal a capital starship from hand to take its matching pilot character (or vice versa) from Reserve Deck, and deploy both simultaneously; reshuffle.  While piloted by an Imperial, Star Destroyers may not have their power reduced. (Immune to Alter.)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
